Title: Ayurveda Ittar Perfume Oil Roll-On
Description: Ayurveda. This perfume combines the goodness of ancient vedic formulations. An amalgamation of herbs, spices, chandan wood and rose petal, the holy scent will remind you of peaceful chants in a temple. The scent can be worn by both men and women and is a unisex perfume.
Description_All:
Weight
0.068000
Content
10 ml. of perfume oil in an easy-to-carry glass bottle. The bottle is sealed with a dipstick plug
that can be used for application. The box also has an additional roll-on applicator. The oil will
last upto 5-6 months on daily usage of the perfume.
Story
Luxurious Veda Ayurveda carves out a path to holistic well being of an individual. As per the
principles of this ancient science, the foundation of true health and wellness is built upon harmony
and balance of the body, mind, and soul. Our Luxurious Veda range is both inspired from, and based
on this ancient ayurvedic wisdom. Formulated with these principles in mind, made using natural
ingredients and blends of the purest essential oils, and patiently handcrafted to perfection with
great care – these products and sure to appeal to your senses and elevate your spirit!
Ingredients
A unique blend of ittar oil extracted from flowers, herbs and spices. Pure & organic ingredients
that are handmade with love. Non alcoholic, halal, non-toxic and 100% cruelty free. What you'll
absolutely love is their remarkable unique quality of maturing over time, which enhances their
potency and scent.
How to Use
Apply the perfume oil on your pulse points - behind the ears, throat, on the wrists, inside the
elbows, and the back of knees. The fragrance develops and diffuses its voluptuous scent all day
long.
Olfactory Note
The beautiful packaging makes the ittar a perfect gifting option for your family, friends and loved
ones. The compact bottle, fitted with the convenient 'roll-on' application, is the perfect travel
companion for those on-the-go.

Title: HoneySuckle Ittar Perfume Oil Roll-On
Description: Honeysuckle. This is a feminine scent that has a touch of peach, pear and honeysuckle flower. Flittering from flower to flower, lapping up the sweet nectar of honeysuckle blossoms as the sun slowly rises up the sky, the bees seem most content. These lovely honeysuckle flowers smell as beautiful as they look. One of the most loved fresh floral fragrances, this scent is pure pleasure for the senses.

Title: Ayurveda Ittar Hand Blown Bottle
Description:
Ayurveda Ittar Hand Blown Bottle
A beautiful symphony of the most delicate and pleasing notes of nature is what these Ayurveda Ittar Hand Blown Bottle have to offer. It is typically made from Essential oils extracted from flowers and spices, This Ittar has been used to impart a pleasant smell to one's body or clothes. These are the perfect travel companion for those on-the-go. What you'll absolutely love is their remarkable unique quality of maturing over time, which enhances their potency and scent.

A beautiful symphony of the most delicate and pleasing notes of nature is what these Patchouli Noir Ittar Hand Blown Bottle have to offer. It is typically made from Essential oils extracted from flowers and spices, This Ittar has been used to impart a pleasant smell to one's body or clothes. These are the perfect travel companion for those on-the-go. What you'll absolutely love is their remarkable unique quality of maturing over time, which enhances their potency and scent.
Description_All:
Content
5ml.
Story
Ayurveda carves out a path to holistic well being of an individual. As per the principles of this
ancient science, the foundation of true health and wellness is built upon harmony and balance of the
body, mind, and soul. Our Luxurious Veda range is both inspired from, and based on this ancient
ayurvedic wisdom. Formulated with these principles in mind, made using natural ingredients and
blends of the pure essential oils, and patiently handcrafted to perfection with great care these
products and sure to appeal to your senses and elevate your spirit!
